item.title: Bachata
item.description: Bachata - Mohamed & Petra Bachata Song by Kay One References Bachata - Mohamed & Petra Your first Individual Basic steps While doing the basic, hip goes in opposite direction of your movements. It is latino dance. Use your body. Long, Short and same Spot. Prepare for the turn. Step and Touch. Bachata Song by Kay One Es por ti Que el destino me trajo hasta aquí Para bailar

item.title: Kizomba
item.description: Kozomba on Fire Kizomba Steps Kozomba on Fire Difference Between Taraxa and Kizomba So taraxa is slow movements the wave movements that lady moving the hips. And when you are very slowly dancing with your lady or with your partner because the music is smooth there are not many strong beats. Taraxa - Wave and Double Time I will be like these feet apart. Relax. One man one hand on the belly another on the back.

item.title: Dance
item.description: Dance Challenge Dance Challenge - May 2022 Dance Improvement - May 2022 Exercise / Stretching Dance Challenge Target to finish one challenge per week. By the end of 2 months you will have lot of skills up your sleeve. Dance Challenge - May 2022 Dance Improvement - May 2022 Body Wave Exercise / Stretching Strectching Daily stretching exercise for improving body movements and body language, making your dance steps sharp and clean.

item.title: Salsa
item.description: Salsa Salsa Shines Routine Salsa Dance Routine Seaon Stylist Bristol Section 1: Hour One Section 2: Hour Two Section 3 Steps YouTube Salsa Salsa Shines Routine Basic, Side Basic, Suzi Q, Side Back Cross, Heel Crusher, Right Turn, Left Turn, 4 Crosses, 4 Taps Salsa Dance Routine Basic, CBL Basic, CBL, Inside Turn Basic, Right Turn (holding both hands. hands are crossed now), left hand comb, right walkthroug and outside turn.

item.title: Ballroom Dancing - JJ
item.description: 10 Tips to Fred Astairedom The Beat of the Music Counting Music: Finding the Sets of 8 Downbeat and Upbeat Rythm Patterns Marking Rythms Counting Step Patterns 10 Tips to Fred Astairedom Understand the Music: Dance is a three-way partnership between you, your partner and the music. Know the music well. Take Lessons Focus on rhythm patterns, not direction of movement: A step pattern—those fancy-looking moves that define a dance— is the bigger motion a couple makes on the floor.
